entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
